sen.j: 阿閇皇子（あべのみこ、648年以降 - 生没年不詳）は、天智天皇の皇子。
sen.e: Abe no miko (date of birth unknown but no earlier than 648 - date of death unknown) was a prince of Emperor Tenchi.
Abe no miko (648 - year of death unknown) was a prince of the Emperor Tenchi.
sen.cmt: カッコ内を修正しました。the を補いました。
sen.e: Abe no miko (648 - year of death unknown) was a prince of the Emperor Tenchi.
His mother was IGA no Uneme Yakako no Iratsume.
His mother was IGA no Uneme Yakako no Iratsume.
His mother was IGA no Uneme Yakako no Iratsume.

sen.j: 『日本書紀』には名が見えない。
sen.e: His name does not appear in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His name does not appear in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).
His name does not appear in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).

sen.j: 「伊賀国名所記」に弘文天皇の同母弟と書かれているが真偽は不明。
sen.e: He is described in 'Iganokuni meisho no ki' (A record of noted places in Iga Province) as a younger maternal half-brother of Emperor Kobun but whether it was true or not is uncertain.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He is described in 'Iganokuni meisho no ki' (A record of noted places in Iga Province) as a younger brother-uterine of the Emperor Kobun, but the authenticity is uncertain.
sen.cmt: maternal half-brother→brother-uterine, whether it was true or not →authenticity と修正しました。the, カンマを補いました。
sen.e: He is described in 'Iganokuni meisho no ki' (A record of noted places in Iga Province) as a younger brother-uterine of the Emperor Kobun, but the authenticity is uncertain.

sen.j: そのため、架空人物説も出ている。
sen.e: Due to this uncertainty, there is even a theory that he was a fictitious character.
Due to this uncertainty, there is even a theory says that he was a fictitious character.
Due to this uncertainty, there is even a theory says that he was a fictitious character.

sen.j: また皇子ではなく、皇女であり、阿陪皇女→元明天皇と同一人物説もある。
sen.e: In addition, there is another theory that he was not a prince but a princess and that he and Princess Ahe, who was later to become Empress Genmei, were the same person.
In addition, there is another theory that he was not a prince but a princess, and that he and the Princess Ahe, who later become the Empress Genmei, were the same person.
sen.cmt: the, カンマを補いました。was to を削除しました。
sen.e: In addition, there is another theory that he was not a prince but a princess, and that he and the Princess Ahe, who later become the Empress Genmei, were the same person.
